Waterfall-cad workflow

Posted on December 30, 2025

I have a waterfall-cad workflow now starting with a template “aavogt/battery-adapter”. Saving the main.hs file results in previews and output files being updated right away if it’s a small model.

Installation

curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | sh # or see https://www.haskell.org/ghcup/install/
for f in ghc cabal hls; do ghcup install $f; done
apt install make f3d entr prusa-slicer 'libocct-*' occt-misc
cabal install ghcid
git clone https://github.com/aavogt/battery-adapter.git
cd battery-adapter
make

Also my aavogt/gcodeviewer and maybe my aavogt/ghcdoc local documentation which is not necessarily better in all ways.
